alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 23 at 2:26AM PST until February 25 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 8 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 4 to 7 feet with dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches, Malibu Coast and Los Angeles County Beaches. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 8 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...There is an increased risk for ocean drowning. Rip currents can pull swimmers and surfers out to sea. Large breaking waves can cause injury, wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize small boats near shore.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions, or stay near occupied lifeguard towers. Rock jetties can be deadly in such conditions, stay off the rocks.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches
